prepend-http

Prepend http:// to humanized URLs like todomvc.com and localhost

Install

$ npm install --save prepend-http

Usage

```js const prependHttp = require(‘prepend-http’);

prependHttp(‘todomvc.com’); //=> ‘http://todomvc.com’

prependHttp(‘localhost’); //=> ‘http://localhost’

prependHttp(‘http://todomvc.com’); //=> ‘http://todomvc.com’ ```
